title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
一、Quick Start1、Create a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Transformer
content:
一、雷达1、启动雷达$ ros2 launch rslidar_sdk start.py
2、将雷达格式转为velodyne格式$ ros2 launch rs_to_velodyne rs_to_velodyne.launch.xml
订阅：/points_raw发布：/veloyne_points3、将三维点云转化为二维点云$ ros2 launch pointcloud_to_laserscan start_launch.py
订阅：  /velodyne_points (PointCloud2)发布：  /scan (LaserScan)二、IMU1、惯性导航驱动$ ros2 launch imu_node imu_node.launch.py
注：惯导驱动文件，发布imu消息等，如果gps可用，也会发布二、相机1、驱动$ ros2 run car_cmd_interface car_cmd_interface_node
订阅：  /cmd_vel（geometry_msgs::msg::Twist，主要使用linear.x作为速度，单位m/s）  /angle（std_msgs::msg::Float32，单位为角度）  /control_cmd（car_msg::msg::VehicleState）发布：  /vehicle_info（car_msg::msg::VehicleState）
